# currentRoadNameVariants

**Instance Property**

An array of strings that describe variants of the current road name.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var currentRoadNameVariants: [String] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property with variants of the current road name, from most to least verbose.

## Managing Upcoming Maneuvers

- **upcomingManeuvers**: The next set of maneuvers the user should perform while following the current route.
- **maneuverState**: The current maneuver state.
- **currentLaneGuidance**: The current lane guidance to use for navigation metadata.
- **add(_:)**: Adds one or more maneuvers, in chronological order, to the navigation session.
- **add(_:)**: Adds one or more lane guidance instances to the navigation session.
- **CPManeuver**: An object that describes a single navigation instruction.
